Name: tmplname
Description: Name of the language this template is for

Name: tmpltrusted
Description: True if language is considered trusted

Name: tmpldbacreate
Description: True if language may be created by a database owner

Name: tmplinline
Description: Name of anonymous-block handler function, or null if none

Name: tmplvalidator
Description: Name of validator function, or null if none

Name: tmpllibrary
Description: Path of shared library that implements language

Name: tmplacl
Description: Access privileges for template (not yet used)
